children.hint: Capture the geocode before entering the facility building.

children.label: Name of LGA Agriculture Point Person

children.label: Contact Phone Number of LGA Agriculture Point Person

children.name: instructions_crops
children.label: Please list the MOST COMMONLY GROWN crops in the LGA. List in order of importance. All prices are market prices per kilogram in Naira.

children.name: price_per_kg
children.label: Average crop price in the LGA

children.name: price_during_lean_season
children.label: Average crop price during lean season

children.name: price_tractor
children.label: Price of renting a tractor to plow 1 hectare

children.name: instructions_livestock
children.label: Please list the MOST COMMONLY REARED livestock in the LGA. List in order of importance. All prices are market prices in Naira.

children.name: price_animal_harvest
children.label: Average price per animal during harvest

children.name: price_animal_lean_season
children.label: Average price per animal during during lean season

children.name: price_feed_kg
children.label: Market price of feed per kilogram

children.name: cost_vet
children.label: Cost of veterinary services per animal

children.name: cost_insemination
children.label: Cost of artificial insemination per animal

children.name: instructions_fish
children.label: Please list the MOST COMMONLY REARED fish in the LGA. List in order of importance. All prices are market prices in Naira.

children.name: price_crop_lean_season
children.label: Average fish price during lean season

children.name: cost_docking
children.label: Cost of docking boat / landing facility

children.name: instructions_facilities

children.label: Number of Silos that require rehabilitation

children.label: Avg cost of construction of a Silos

children.label: Avg annual cost of maintaining a Silos

children.label: Avg annual cost of rehabilitating a Silos

children.label: Avg additional administrative cost per Silos
